W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: The Crowrealm: The World of Sand

W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a world covered in sand on the other side of the door. Is there really a triangle to be found in a world like this? Or people, for that matter?
